Največji strah doživela za volanom
Glasbenica se kač ne boji, vožnja pa je eden njenih največjih strahov.
05 Nov 2019, 21:03 by A. K.
Opravljanje vozniškega izpita je že tako ali tako stresno, nabiranje prvih izkušenj za volanom, medtem ko si obkrožen s kamerami, pa je sploh poglavje zase. Kljub temu se je prav za tak način spopadanja z enim svojih največjih strahov odločila Kukla Kesherović, pevka in režiserka opaznih videospotov, ki so zaznamovali skupino Matter, sodelovala je tudi z bendom Mrfy, njen videospot za pesem Mišići izvajalke Senidah pa ima na youtubu kar 46 milijonov ogledov.Celo telo imam napeto, to je tako stresno.Čeprav se je v videu za pesem Anakonda povsem mirno družila z ogromno kačo, pa je v resnici vožnja tista, ki je zanjo velik izziv. »Celo telo imam napeto, to je tako stresno,« je povedala po prvi uri vožnje z enim od najmlajših vozniških učiteljev v državi. Kamere je pravzaprav ne motijo, saj jih je vajena, vožnja pa je nekaj povsem drugega. »Šele pozneje sem se začela zavedati, da bom pred kamerami opravljala nekaj, česar se najbolj bojim,« je dejala mlada umetnica. Učne ure kljub vsemu trenutno potekajo brez večjih pretresov.»Nič dramatičnega se mi še ni zgodilo za volanom, kljub temu pa sem prepričana, da se moj učitelj zelo zabava, saj sem na trenutke zelo panična in delam tudi kakšne neumnosti,« še prizna Kukla.

She experienced the greatest fear behind the wheel
The musician is not afraid of snakes, and driving is one of her biggest fears.
05 Nov 2019, 21:03 by A.K.
Passing a driving test is already stressful, and getting the first experience behind the wheel while surrounded by cameras is a chore in itself. Nevertheless, Kukla Kesherović, singer and director of notable music videos that characterized the Matter band, chose to deal with one of her biggest fears, collaborating with the band Mrfy, and her video for Senidah's Muscle Song has 46 millions of views.I have a whole body tense, it's so stressful.While in the video for the song Anakonda, she was quite calm with a huge snake, but in reality, driving is one that is a big challenge for her. "I have a whole body tense, it's so stressful," she said after the first hour of driving with one of the country's youngest driving teachers. The cameras don't really bother her, she is used to them, and driving is something else entirely. "It wasn't until much later that I became aware that I would be doing the thing I was most afraid of in front of the cameras," said the young artist. However, lessons are currently going on without major turbulence. "Nothing dramatic has happened to me behind the wheel, but I still believe that my teacher is having a lot of fun, because at the moment I'm very panicked and do some nonsense," Kukla admits .
